Details

Project details

iorad is a startup in the beta launch phase going live at the first time in the next few weeks.

Prior launching they've decided to give a face lift for their two most important pages: the Pricing and the Checkout.

The project requirements were: speed of execution, keeping current visual assets, cross-device and browser compatibility.
